description: Shows metrics of a single node.

panels.description: Version number of node software.
panels.title: GoShimmer

panels.description: Shortened version of the public key of the node.
panels.title: Node Identity

panels.description: Shows the time elapsed since the start of the node.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Describes if the node is in synced state.
panels.title: Synced

panels.description: Aggregated MPS for all message types in the communication layer.
panels.title: Total MPS

panels.description: Current CPU usage of the node.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory consumed by the node.
panels.title: Memory Consumption

panels.description: Size of the ledger database.
panels.title: Database Size

panels.description: Number of currently connected neighbors.
panels.title: Current Neighbors

panels.description: Calculated for each dropped neighbor.
panels.title: AvgNeighbor Connection Lifetime

panels.description: Amount of newly registered neighbor connections.
panels.title: New Neighbor Connections

panels.description: Amount of neighbor connections dropped.
panels.title: Dropped Neighbor Connections

panels.description: Shows tips in message and value layer.
panels.title: Tips

panels.description: Number of messages in missingMessageStore. These are the message the node knows it doesn't have and tries to requests them.
panels.title: Missing Messages

panels.description: Describes the amount of total, solid and not solid messages in the node's database.
panels.title: Messages in Database

panels.description: Number of messages currently requested by the message tangle.
panels.title: Message Request Queue Size

panels.description: Average time it takes to solidify messages.
panels.title: Average Solidification Time

panels.content:
# Total Network Traffic


Since the start of the node.

options.content:
# Total Network Traffic


Since the start of the node.

panels.description: The average number of rounds it takes to finalize a conflict.
panels.title: Average Rounds To Finalize

panels.description: Number of finalized conflicts.
panels.title: Finalized Conflicts

panels.description: Number of failed conflicts.
panels.title: Failed Conflicts

panels.description: Describes how many FPC query requests the node has received.
panels.title: FPC Queries RX

panels.description: Describes how many FPC opinions were requested from the node.
panels.title: FPC Conflict Queries RX

title: GoShimmer Local Metrics
